programme.title: Showdown at Peahi
programme.desc: Kai Lenny competes in the WSL Big Wave World Tour event at his home break of Peahi (Jaws) in Maui.

programme.title: The legend of Nazaré
programme.desc: Kai Lenny travels to Nazaré in Portugal to train with Brazilian big wave charger Lucas 'Chumbo' Chianca.

programme.title: Slaying Gigantes
programme.desc: Kai Lenny competes in the Gigantes de Nazaré contest before jetting home to catch a great day at Peahi (Jaws).

programme.title: Redemption at Nazaré
programme.desc: The Big Wave World Tour tow surfing event is on at Nazaré – Kai Lenny‘s last chance to get a win this winter.

programme.title: Gold Coast 2018
programme.desc: Get to know Australia's Gold Coast and the surfers who are there to catch some sick waves.

programme.title: Bells Beach 2018
programme.desc: Australian surfing luminaries weigh in on Mick Fanning's legacy and size up some spots in Victoria.

programme.title: Margaret River 2018
programme.desc: Get the lowdown on Margaret River, as the WSL Championship Tour 2018 reaches its final Aussie leg.

programme.title: Brazil's waves 2018
programme.desc: Catch up with the world's best surfers as they make the most of their time in Saquarema, Brazil.

programme.title: Bali's surf 2018
programme.desc: Lee Wilson takes us on a tour through his day as he heads out on the waves in Bali, Indonesia.

programme.title: Jeffreys Bay 2018
programme.desc: Big names in surfing share the thrill of riding the spectacular waves at Jeffreys Bay, South Africa.

programme.title: France and Portugal 2018
programme.desc: Find out which European wave paradise surfing pros prefer: France or Portugal – and why.

programme.title: Hawaii 2018
programme.desc: All you need to know about the Hawaiian surf scene on Oahu's North Shore in one convenient package.

programme.title: The beast awakens
programme.desc: Surfer Kai heads to a Nazaré swell, but ends up fighting for his life after his biggest wipeout ever.

programme.title: Redemption at Peahi
programme.desc: Jaws lights up and Kai looks to redeem himself after a tough loss in the Big Wave event there the year before.

programme.title: Day of days
programme.desc: Kai, Ridge and Ian Walsh fly to Mavericks in California for what's being hailed as the swell of the decade.

programme.title: From F1 desert racing to a skatepark in the sky
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from riding a skatepark under a hot air balloon to F1 drivers racing on water.

programme.title: From F1 soapbox racing to breaking world records
programme.desc: Breaking records: all in a day's work! See Baumgartner jump from space, 65 women skydive and a BMXer loop big.

programme.title: From a pinball human to 93kph speed skating
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from speed skating in Norway to BASE jumping from treacherous Mount Everest.

programme.title: From skydiving with skis to flying into a volcano
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from wingsuit flying over an active volcano to skydiving on skis.

programme.title: From a paper plane contest to diving off ruins
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from diving off ancient ruins to acing a paper plane competition.

programme.title: Proving ground (part 2)
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases a dream win at The Eddie then takes on the World Tour’s best pro surfers at Sunset Beach.

programme.title: Air time
programme.desc: To hone his aerial skills, Kai hits the waves of Bali, the slopes of Jackson Hole and a wave pool in Texas.

programme.title: The test
programme.desc: It’s Super Swell Saturday at Jaws and tests stand in the way of Kai’s goal of his year’s best performance.

programme.title: Proving ground (part 1)
programme.desc: The Eddie is on and Kai Lenny has plenty to prove on the North Shore of Oahu at both Pipeline and Waimea Bay.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, and his home life and performance goals are ready to reset.
